April 21, 2020
--------------

Good Afternoon Citizens,

The 2020 Census is upon us and we encourage all of our citizens to get counted. Responses to the 2020 Census shape decisions about how billions of dollars in federal funds are distributed to states and communities like ours for the next 10-years for critical services -Healthcare, Emergency Response, Schools, Education Programs, and Roads/Bridges are all impacted by the 2020 Census. 

Please help us increase our Census Response Rates by reminding your family, relatives, friends, neighbors, co-workers, people that you go to church with, and everyone else to complete their census because it benefits our community.

At the moment our City’s response rate is at a 4.5%, let’s shoot for a 100% response rate.You may find additional information on the flyers below on the safety and security of your responses.

Stay Home, and Stay Safe

#2020Census

[![](https://cityoflavilla.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Census-E-4-21-20-231x300.png)](https://cityoflavilla.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Census-E-4-21-20.png)

[![](https://cityoflavilla.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Census-S-4-21-20-232x300.png)](https://cityoflavilla.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Census-S-4-21-20.png)

[![](https://cityoflavilla.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Census-Response-Rate-4-21-20-295x300.png)](https://cityoflavilla.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Census-Response-Rate-4-21-20.png)
